column4: Nasu and the cauliflower tempura or anything on the menu and be amazed. The deserts
column5: which I usually never order at other restaurants
column6: are incredible so save room. I recently ate at Jiro's in Tokyo and it was really great
column7: but I would rather have a meal at Uchi
column8: that's what I think about this restaurant. The Austin location
column9: the original is also totally amazing! I have been in Asia traveling for the last two months and can't wait to eat and see the folks at Uchi tonight.
